Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: rbalaji_it
Reviews.Content: This was a nice stay and enjoyable. We both enjoyed the stay and it was a nice getaway

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all costs”
Reviews.Author: themightyreds37
Reviews.Content: Gave us room 102 which stunk and was dirty so we asked for another room which was just as bad. The bed was all wrinkled it looked like it have never been cleaned and I'm sure it wasn't safe outside because people were definitely up to something so we decided to leave and got our money back. The place should be bulldozed or burnt down,the indian manager should be banned from working in the hotel industry ever again and the people hanging around the place should be picked up by the police. In summary a disgraceful advert and embarrassment to Kissimme.

Reviews.Title: “Keep Looking...This Place Terrible!!!”
Reviews.Author: yokeeplooking
Reviews.Content: stayed in this motel for a few nights..and it was horrible..ROACHES from every angle of the room...fridge and microwave was gross..Trash can was filled with mold..beds felt like they were filled with dust mites (getting itchy just thinking about it!!!)...the whole entire room and motel was a disaster!!!..and something told me to check out the sex offender database & Yes they have a sex offender living at this motel and he stayed exactly next door to my family (I believe room 201 or 202) Never again will I endanger myself and children!!! If you have to stay in an affordable place....please check out who and what types of people and bugs stay there too!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Worst Place Ever”
Reviews.Author: Blake W
Reviews.Content: I thought I had found a decent place to stay for a couple of weeks. Great rate and now I know why. The room was filled with roaches and the mattress and box spring was molded and had holes in it. My son and I both could not breath after a few hours of being in here. We also received several phone calls throughout the night, it was someone saying they had the money and we better have the stuff or else... I asked the person not to call back, yet they kept calling. I went to the office at 645am and talked to the night manager and he said if we checked out we would not get a refund. This place is not safe. Even our room door would appear to be closed, however, anyone could push it open at anytime, so if you stay make sure you use every lock on the door to ensure your safety. There was cars in and out of the place all night even though they have a great camera system in place here but with the phones calls all night there is no doubt that they were people coming here to buy drugs. The only thing good I can say about this place is they have great internet connection and 200 tv channels. But overall this place is a dump. BEWARE if you decided to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “what a joke!”
Reviews.Author: smile49
Reviews.Content: I was here on a business trip with my company we were not able to review all of these reviews before hand, now I wish we had been able to. this was by far the worst motel i have ever stayed in. I would not ever recommend this motel to anyone. There were bugs everywhere no clean sheets at all the pillows and beds looked as if everyone in the town had slept in them and they had never been cleaned. deffeniatly not a place you would want to stay at no matter what your circumstances are. I wouldnt even allow my dog to stay in this motel. yes its cheap but its deffeniatly not worth the price they are even asking.

Reviews.Title: “Motel Hell”
Reviews.Author: IndianapolisDoug075
Reviews.Content: Stay at this dump at your own risk, SERIOUSLY. There were bugs, roaches, in the room, we went walking one day and would bet the farm we saw a pimp and his "client" turning a trick in one of the rooms. They provided two towels, no washcloths, and even though they stated American Express was an acceptable payment, they tried to get more money out of us because of this credit card. This was, bar none, THE WORST motel we have ever stayed in.

Reviews.Title: “Disapointing”
Reviews.Author: TheLooseMoose
Reviews.Content: Was very diaspointed in my stay here. Where to start? The advertised rate on their website and on their marquee was for around $28/night, plus tax. Like many of the Orlando area hotels, they charge a "resort fee". This adds six dollars per night. The man at the front desk said it was a "tax", which is not true. It is a hotel charged FEE to make more them more money. Only the government can charge taxes. This "resort fee" was added to cover things like the shuttle, pool, local calls-none of which I used. What a scam. Anyways, the room was dated, but spacious, and appeared clean. However, looks can be deceiving (like their advertised rate). The tub was clogged, so by the time I was done showering, I would be standing in ankle-deep water. The toilet overflowed (thankfully after a later flush, so it was "just" water). The door did not always lock after leaving the room. Glad I checked it! Had to open and shut it a few times to get it to work properly. The breakfast consisted of coffee, an orange juice-like drink, and mini donuts. Lastly, the hotel can only be accessd from one direction. Coming back from Disney, I had to pass the hotel and make a u-turn on a busy road to get back to it. Needless to say, I will not stay their again.

Reviews.Title: “Oh My Word”
Reviews.Author: i2snookums
Reviews.Content: I knew that when I booked this motel it was not going to be one of the best, however, I did not know that they did not own up to anything they wrote one the web. The pool is not heated year round, the continental breakfast that should have had coffee, oj, donuts, and muffins, only had what tasted like tang for oj, coffee, and tang. the rooms should have been cleaned daily, by this I always thought they would change the sheets and clean the bathroom. All they did was make the bed and pick up the used towels and give new ones. As for the sheets, they use sooooo much bleach on them I had little burns on my face and hands and my eyes watered so bad I could not keep them open. There was supposed to be internet access but there was non so do not look for it. I'm sorry I really didn't expect much but this was the lowest of the low for the amount of money they charged. I will NEVER STAY THERE AGAIN!!

Reviews.Title: “Best for the $$$$$$$”
Reviews.Author: baby2n
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Knights Inn a bit back, and not only was it clean, roomy and staff friendly, the pool was clean and fun!!! My kids loved the pool and the fact we could grill out and have a good old fashioned picnic right at the hotel. We arrived very late due to airline delays, and I was worried no one would be there to check us in. Well, to my surprise, there was a professional attendant there, friendly and helpful. She suggested places for us to go get food/drinks that late at night, as well as offered to help us with the luggage. Unreal! The room was spacious, clean and a microwave and fridge! I didn't expect that. I loved the fact that they conserve energy/resources and leave a remark saying that they wont change laundry unless we request. Eco-friendly, for a budget hotel..um, cool! Left the room attendants a small but moderate tip and yeah, worth it...awesome service all around. Continental breakfast was perfect, got us all going for the day. If you want a place to sleep, and a place to chill during your very busy and exciting stay in Orlando...this is the place. Major bang for the buck. If you are used to first class, and used to paying for a room that is beyond most people's mortgage payments, don't stay here...if you want a great room/pool/service for the money...STAY here..this place is exactly where I will continue to stay for years! Thank you Knights Inn...your rooms/facility and staff are the best!

Reviews.Title: “It was really comfortable. It is located near main attractions .Rooms are nice.”
Reviews.Author: angelgirl26
Reviews.Content: Whenever i visit Orlando/Kissimmee i stay at Knights Inn as i really find it comfortable and cosy. They have all the facilities and free shuttle to disney and other attractions. It is well prices and rooms are very neat and clean. Its overall a nice hotel which i whould recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible...”
Reviews.Author: Maritimemagic
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 2 nights, because our friends were staying next door and we wanted to be close to them,their motel was booked, the carpet was dirty, walls needed to be painted the air conditioned was making a horrible sound, our own fault, we should have paid a bit more and got a decent place. The pool is really nice, not heated,but the loungers were falling apart...

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, But Not Worth It”
Reviews.Author: Kat_Cubs_fan
Reviews.Content: I'm a cheapscape; always have been. However, I can no longer condone deplorable conditions just to save a buck. We stayed at the Knight's Inn two years in a row for just a two-night stay each time. We found their ad in the Kissimmee Vacation Planner and a coupon for a $28.95 rate both years (they've now gone to a coupon rate of $32.95). We only spent time in the room to shower and sleep, but we couldn't stand to stay here again. The place is falling apart and after the hurricanes of 2004, its worse than ever. Major renovations need to be done, or better still, tear down the whole place and start over. We had an overflow in the toilet that took over two hours to get someone to fix. The roof had leaked during the hurricanes, but no repairs to the ceiling have been done. I can't recommend this motel to anyone, cheap or not. Thanks!!!

HotelInfo.Name: Tropicana Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 4131 West Vine Street, Kissimmee, FL 34741
